definition: to lose sth abstract but important (courage, authority, one's life etc)/to be bereaved of (one's spouse etc)/to die/disappointed/discouraged
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Drink up and quit all this remorse talk.
sentences.chinese: 乾了這一杯，不說這些喪氣話了。
